author: Reuters Editorial
title: Trump to decide next steps after 'frank' U.S.-China trade talks -White House
text:
WASHINGTON, May 4 (Reuters) - U.S. trade officials had candid trade discussions with their Chinese counterparts, the White House said in statement on Friday following a two-day bilateral meeting in Beijing, adding that President Donald Trump will decide the next steps.
“The delegation held frank discussions with Chinese officials on rebalancing the United States–China bilateral economic relationship, improving China’s protection of intellectual property, and identifying policies that unfairly enforce technology transfers,” the White House statement said. (Reporting by Susan Heavey Editing by David Alexander)
